scripts.preinstall: node -e "if(process.env.npm_execpath.indexOf('yarn') === -1) throw new Error('You must use Yarn to install dependencies')"
scripts.build-common: yarn generate-styles && yarn generate-icons-list && yarn build-sass
scripts.build: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging rollup -c rollup.config.js && node build_utils/scripts/updateImportForMixins.js && yarn generate-declarations
scripts.build:visualizer: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && node build_utils/scripts/updateImportForMixins.js && yarn generate-declarations
scripts.build:buildStats: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && node build_utils/scripts/updateImportForMixins.js && yarn generate-declarations
scripts.build:visualizer:buildStats: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && node build_utils/scripts/updateImportForMixins.js && yarn generate-declarations
scripts.build:beta: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=beta rollup -c rollup.config.js && node build_utils/scripts/updateImportForMixins.js
scripts.build:beta:visualizer: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=beta INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && node build_utils/scripts/updateImportForMixins.js
scripts.build:beta:buildStats: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=beta INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && node build_utils/scripts/updateImportForMixins.js
scripts.build:beta:visualizer:buildStats: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=beta INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && node build_utils/scripts/updateImportForMixins.js
scripts.build:prod: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=production rollup -c rollup.config.js && node build_utils/scripts/updateImportForMixins.js
scripts.build:prod:visualizer: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=production INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && node build_utils/scripts/updateImportForMixins.js
scripts.build:prod:buildStats: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=production INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && node build_utils/scripts/updateImportForMixins.js
scripts.build:prod:visualizer:buildStats: yarn rm-dist && yarn build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=production INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && node build_utils/scripts/updateImportForMixins.js
scripts.lint: yarn lint-js "**/*.{mts,cts,ts,tsx,mjs,cjs,js,jsx,mdx}" && yarn lint-css "**/*.{css,scss}" && yarn prettier .
scripts.lint:fix: yarn lint-js:fix "**/*.{mts,cts,ts,tsx,mjs,cjs,js,jsx,mdx}" && yarn lint-css:fix "**/*.{css,scss}" && yarn prettier:fix .
scripts.storybook: yarn build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging STORY_ENV=development storybook dev -p 6006
scripts.storybook:visualizer: yarn build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging STORY_ENV=development INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true storybook dev -p 6006
scripts.storybook:buildStats: yarn build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging STORY_ENV=development INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true storybook dev -p 6006
scripts.storybook:visualizer:buildStats: yarn build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging STORY_ENV=development INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true storybook dev -p 6006
scripts.storybook:build: yarn build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging STORY_ENV=staging storybook build
scripts.storybook:build:visualizer: yarn build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging STORY_ENV=staging INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true storybook build
scripts.storybook:build:buildStats: yarn build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging STORY_ENV=staging INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true storybook build
scripts.storybook:build:visualizer:buildStats: yarn build-common && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging STORY_ENV=staging INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true storybook build
